org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.tabular

Class QFunctionFromValueFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.tabular.QFunctionFromValueFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, QFunction

    public class QFunctionFromValueFunction
extends Object
implements QFunction
    This QFunction has an internal ValueFunction and uses the fact, that 
     Q(s,a) = sum_{s'} p(s'|s,a)(r(s,a,s') + gamma V(s'))
    Therefore the transition function 
    p(s'|s,a)
    , the reward function 
    r(s,a,s')
    and the discount factor 
    gamma
    is needed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
